document.full_text: the rank-and-file members of a new york law enforcement union have overwhelmingly rejected a deal that governor andrew cuomo hoped would serve as a model for negotiations with larger unions to achieve cost savings.
document.title: new york union rejects governor's offer
lines_and_colors: the rank-and-file members of a new york law enforcement union have overwhelmingly rejected a deal that governor andrew cuomo hoped would serve as a model for negotiations with larger unions to achieve cost savings.
